snippet: Chola Mapoma immigrated from Zambia in hopes of getting a great job and helping his family back home, but it has not worked out that way.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens helps Chola Mapoma, living at Miracle House in Brooklyn while he undergoes medical treatment, to secure funds to pay replacement fee for a lost green card so that he can resume receiving Social Security.
lead_paragraph: Chola Mapoma immigrated from Zambia in hopes of getting a great job and helping his family back home, but it has not worked out that way.

headline.print_headline: Recuperating, and Focusing Anew on Elusive Goals
